--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> --- Astrotrain ---
> 
> Astrotrain transforms into robot mode. He scans the new 
> Decepticons, "Hello," he grunts, "Megatron's orders were to pick 
> up the new bots, and scrap the ship. Wildrider his began the 
> process." He walks over to the crashed ship, and says back to the 
> new bots in an irritated voice, "Get to work, we don't have all 
day." 
> He begins to peel away a armour plated side piece of the ship.



::Domnijoe and Blindchaos::

    Domnijoe looked at Wildrider's eager distruction of the ship. She 
saluted mockingly at Astrotrain's words and hungerly started tearing 
away at it's hull with her hands. Oh how she savored the useless 
object's extemanation!! To top it off, she was glad Megatron still 
functioned.
    Blindchaos made his way back onto the ship, mindful of
Wildrider's  
Whereabouts. He didn't want to be accidently caught in the other 
Decepticon's demolition efforts. Blindchaos transformed himself into 
his anamalistic form: an undersized Anklyosaur. He began knocking 
walls in with his massive tail club, the noise music to his audio 
sensors.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
